message:
SYSTEM: Presentacion_OEG_OPM_9-12-2010.pdf: Página 3
1
OPM Overview
Background
•
OPM is the outcome of the Provenance Challenge Series
•
Specification Requirements
– Define the model in a precise, technologic agnostic manner.
•
Specification Non requirements
– OPM does not specify the internal representations that systems have 
to adopt to store and manipulate provenance internally.
•
Based on a causal graph.
speaker: SYSTEM
